segments.text: May I see your passport please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you travelling for business or pleasure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to visit some relatives here for several months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have anything to declare ? Jewellery or cash ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The only things I brought were some cloths and my notebook computer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you bring any fruits , vegetables , fresh meats or plants into this country ?
segments.speaker: S1
